verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%> Praise, <S%H1984><s%> you servants <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3050><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> from this time forth <S%H6258><s%> and <S%H5704><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>
From the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%> to the going down <S%H3996><s%> of the same, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh's name <S%H8034><s%> is to be praised. <S%H1984><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is high <S%H7311><s%> above <S%H7311><s%> all nations, <S%H1471><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%> above <S%H7311><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
Who is like Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> who has his seat <S%H3427><s%> on high, <S%H1361><s%>
Who stoops down <S%H8213><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> and in the earth? <S%H776><s%>
He raises up <S%H6965><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> out of the dust. <S%H6083><s%> Lifts <S%H7311><s%> up the needy <S%H34><s%> from the ash heap; <S%H830><s%>
that he may set <S%H3427><s%> him with princes, <S%H5081><s%> even with the princes <S%H5081><s%> of his people. <S%H5971><s%>
He settles <S%H3427><s%> the barren woman <S%H6135><s%> in her home, <S%H1004><s%> as a joyful <S%H8056><s%> mother <S%H517><s%> of children. <S%H1121><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%>
